name: Ext_R3_GuidanceResponse_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.GuidanceResponse.reason[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents GuidanceResponse.reason[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/GuidanceResponse|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Indicates the reason the request was initiated. This is typically provided as a parameter to the evaluation and echoed by the service, although for some use cases, such as subscription- or event-based scenarios, it may provide an indication of the cause for the response.
element.comment: `GuidanceResponse.reasonCode` maps to R5 `GuidanceResponse.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `GuidanceResponse.reasonReference` maps to R5 `GuidanceResponse.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
